item.title: Vsc Dark Themes
item.description: Default Dark+ The background looks quite pleasant but variables in light blue and method calls on light yellow make it a bit too bright. Dark (Visual Studio) https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=gerane.Theme-Capo-Dark Variables: dark blue Keywords: dark purple Function/method calls: dark green Double quotes strings: dark red The background is light black, thus, looks smooth and goes easy on the eyes https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Zyst.Egoist-One Quite similar to Capo Dark, except the background is brighter Variables: red/grey Keywords: dark orange/yellow Function/method calls: dark blue Strings: dark green
